body:
Hey Avicus players.
I've got bored and started going on Infractions of  people. Then I have found this one:
I've been wondering if switching teams before the game ends for EXP is allowed or not allowed.
I didn't do it for your information, because in my opinion it isn't fair.
However, it isn't saying it's not allowed in the rules, which means you can do it.
I think those punishments should be still given for Teamstackers and people that switch teams for their own EXP.
Opinions?

Section A, Point 8 in the Avicus's rule says that:
"Do not intentionally take advantage of server exploits that give you an advantage of other players. Doing so results in a severe punishment. Instead, we highly encourage you to email support@avicus.net with details regarding the potential server exploit."
